input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_AR_System, HP_ServiceCenter
String Value - This contains the name or the id of the field you wish to search against.
String Value - This contains the value you are looking for in the key 1 field.
String Value - Optional second key name or id
String Value - A query based upon the values and keys in the above fields.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The task concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document containing failed tasks
String Value - Count of tasks successfully created.
String Value - Count of task failures
Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully. Valid values: success, failure.
A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fields> <xsl:apply-templates /> </fields> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mappings/*"> <xsl:if test="string(@queryable) = '' or @queryable='true' "> <field> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </field> </xsl:if> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="query" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <schema>${schema name}</schema> <key>${key 1}</key> <value>${value 1}</value> <key2>${key 2}</key2> <value2>${value 2}</value2> <query> <xsl:value-of select="." /> </query> ${fields} </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Task data failed for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet:
<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="value" />
<xsl:template match="/"> <entries> <xsl:apply-templates/> </entries> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="entry"> <xsl:copy-of select="."/> </xsl:template>
<xsl:template match="metadata" />
</xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Task data was completed successfully for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <entity-type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">task</xsl:text> </entity-type> <operation-name> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">retrieve-change-task</xsl:text> </operation-name> <model> <keys /> <instance> <header> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='header'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </header> <description-structure> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <description> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='description-structure'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <element> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </element> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </description> </description-structure> <middle> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='middle'"> <xsl:if test=""${translated key 1}"='asset'"> <asset> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> Array</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <element> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </element> </xsl:element> </asset> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test=""${translated key 1}"!='asset'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:if> </middle> <close> <type> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">Structure</xsl:text> </type> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='close'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </close> <xsl:if test="'${location value}'='instance'"> <xsl:element name="${translated key 1}"> <value>${value 1}</value> <type>${type value}</type> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </instance> </model> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Task data failed for ", .)

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="query-mappings">${query mappings}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <hp-service-center-response> <xsl:copy-of select="node()/*" /> <mappings> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($query-mappings)/*/*" /> </mappings> </hp-service-center-response> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <Tasks> <xsl:apply-templates select="//item/parameters/model/instance" /> </Tasks> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="instance"> <Task> <xsl:call-template name="process-node" /> </Task> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="process-node"> <xsl:for-each select="*"> <xsl:variable name="instance-element-child-name" select="local-name()" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Array'"> <!-- Pick the <mapping>'s child element name in case when a <mappings>'s child element's text value equals current <instance>'s child name --> <xsl:variable name="target-element-name" select="local-name(//mappings/*[text()=$instance-element-child-name])" /> <xsl:if test="string-length($target-element-name)>0"> <xsl:element name="{$target-element-name}"> <xsl:for-each select="*[local-name()=$instance-element-child-name]/element"> <xsl:if test="position() > 1"> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:when> <xsl:when test="type/text()='Structure'"> <xsl:call-template name="process-node" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:if test="string-length(local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name]))>0"> <xsl:element name="{local-name(//mappings/*[./text()=$instance-element-child-name])}"> <xsl:value-of select="value/text()" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:if> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <objects> <queryString> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 1}')>0 and string-length('${value 1}')>0 and string-length('${key 2}') = 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select Name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Category_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Account__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Closed_By__c,BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__completedDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskDescription__c,BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__endDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__Impact_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Last_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__note__c, BMCServiceDesk__openDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__recommendations__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskResolution__c,BMCServiceDesk__startDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__Urgency_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKChange__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKIncident__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKProblem__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKTemplate__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_1__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_2__c, OIC_BL_Job_ID__c, OIC_BL_Job_Name__c, OIC_BL_Job_Description__c, OIC_BL_Job_Type__c, OIC_Schedule_ID__c, OIC_RCP_Console_Path__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKRelease__c from BMCServiceDesk__Task__c where ${key 1} = '${value 1}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')>0 and string-length('${value 2}')>0 and string-length('${key 1}') >0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select Name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Category_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Account__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Closed_By__c,BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__completedDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskDescription__c,BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__endDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__Impact_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Last_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__note__c, BMCServiceDesk__openDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__recommendations__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskResolution__c,BMCServiceDesk__startDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__Urgency_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKChange__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKIncident__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKProblem__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKTemplate__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_1__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_2__c, OIC_BL_Job_ID__c, OIC_BL_Job_Name__c, OIC_BL_Job_Description__c, OIC_BL_Job_Type__c, OIC_Schedule_ID__c, OIC_RCP_Console_Path__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKRelease__c from BMCServiceDesk__Task__c where ${key 1} = '${value 1}' and ${key 2} = '${value 2}'</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${key 2}')=0 and string-length('${key 1}')= 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">select Name,ID,BMCServiceDesk__Category_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Account__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Type__c,BMCServiceDesk__Closed_By__c,BMCServiceDesk__closeDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__comments__c,BMCServiceDesk__completedDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskDescription__c,BMCServiceDesk__dueDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__endDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__Impact_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_First_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__Client_Last_Name__c,BMCServiceDesk__note__c, BMCServiceDesk__openDateTime__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKPriority__c,BMCServiceDesk__recommendations__c,BMCServiceDesk__taskResolution__c,BMCServiceDesk__startDate__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKStatus__c,BMCServiceDesk__Urgency_ID__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKChange__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKIncident__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKProblem__c,BMCServiceDesk__FKTemplate__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_1__c, OIC_Operational_Category_Tier_2__c, OIC_BL_Job_ID__c, OIC_BL_Job_Name__c, OIC_BL_Job_Description__c, OIC_BL_Job_Type__c, OIC_Schedule_ID__c, OIC_RCP_Console_Path__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_Start_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__Scheduled_End_Date__c, BMCServiceDesk__FKRelease__c from BMCServiceDesk__Task__c</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </queryString> </objects> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("The retrieval of Task data failed for ", .)
concat("The retrieval of Task data was completed successfully for ", .)
concat("The retrieval of Task data failed for ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow will find a task for a given set of variables.
